bilingual.source: The stock market software shows realtime changes in stock prices.
bilingual.target: 股票市场软件显示股票价格的实时变化。

bilingual.source: After the stock listing, the stock price quickly rose.
bilingual.target: 股票上市后，股价迅速上涨。

bilingual.source: He invested in a lot of stock.
Investors often check the ticker to monitor stock performance.
bilingual.target: 投资者经常查看股票代码来监控股票表现。
这个股票指数今天上涨了。
股票价格每天都在波动。

bilingual.source: He decided to sell all his stock.
bilingual.target: 他决定卖掉所有的股票。

list.abstract: stock（英[stɒk]，美[stɑːk]），英语单词，作名词为库存；存货；资本。作形容词为存货的；库存的；常备的。作动词为贮备；备有；供应。短语搭配有stock market（股市）。例句为“I worked as a stock clerk at Southwest Super Foods.（我在西南超级食品公司做仓库管理员。）” stock名词类近义词有birth、blood等。形容词类近义词有ordinary、mediocre。动词类近义词有有be furnished with、corner。形容词为stockholding，名词形式有stockist、stocker、stockbroker等。

yingyinNormal.en: Another "Situation." Another stock to reinvest his earnings and then some.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又有新"形势" ，又有新股票把他赚的钱再投进这支股票。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to know my secret? I bought stock in Marvel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想知道我的秘诀吗？我买了漫威的股票。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, I went up. What? My stock, MEG, it went up 2 points.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我涨了。什么？我的股票MEG，涨了两点。

yingyinNormal.en: Nobody knows if a stock is gonna go up, down, sideways, or in circles, least of all stockbrokers, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有人能预测股票是涨还是跌，还是持平，还是震荡，尤其是股票经纪人，根本不知道，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You're not gonna be a stock boy. Why not? Cause you're a stockbroker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能当仓储员。为什么？因为你是个股票经纪人。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I take it you have no plans to sell your $200 million in Bear stock?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的理解是你不准备卖掉你手中2亿的贝尔股票？

yingyinNormal.en: Right now, John, the stock trades over the counter at 10 cents a share.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是现在 John这支股票场外交易价格是10美分一股。

yingyinNormal.en: Great, Michael. Whenever you find something interesting, we all tend to make money. What stock are you valuing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，迈克尔，每次你发现有趣的事，我们都赚钱了，你在估值哪只股票？

yingyinNormal.en: I want you to go out there and I want you to ram Steve Madden stock down your clients' throats until they choke on it!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你们去把史蒂夫·马登的股票塞进客户的喉咙里直到他们噎死为止。

yingyinNormal.en: He was attempting to sell trade secrets to a competitor. If the suit drags on, it could hang over the stock price.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他试图将公司交易机密卖给竞争对手。如果这个官司拖得太久，可能会影响到股票价格。

yingyinNormal.en: What's to know? Buy sell, high low, bears bulls. Yes Manhattan. Yeah telephone number of the stock, selling store.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要通什么？买，卖，高，低，熊市，牛市。喂，曼哈顿麻烦帮我查个电话号码，股票商店。

yingyinNormal.en: Because even though corporate profits and the stock market have hit all-time highs the typical family isn't bringing home more than they did 15 years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为即便企业利润和股票市场已经冲到历史性高度，典型的家庭在生活中并没有比15年前过得更好。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Miller, I'm sorry. Quick question. From the time you guys started talking, Bear Stearns stock has fallen more than 38%. Would you still buy more?
yingyinNormal.zh: 米勒先生，对不起，很快地问个问题，从你们开始发言贝尔斯通的股票已经跌了38%，你还会买更多吗？

yingyinNormal.en: After a delay, the stock market began a big bull market that lasted 18 years, and the US economy enjoyed the greatest growth period in its history. This experience was like a blow to my head with a baseball bat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 延迟之后股票市场进入了长达18年的牛市，这也是历史上美国经济发展最好的时间。这件事情对我来说是当头棒喝。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't know. Samaritan crashed the stock market.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还不知道，撒马利亚人让股市崩盘。

yingyinNormal.en: Next, just add good vegetable stock or you can use chicken stock, and then give it a good stir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来加入蔬菜高汤或者鸡汤，然后充分搅匀。

yingyinNormal.en: Mix the noodles in well, add a little bit of the stock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把面拌均匀，加一点高汤。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Rach. The tampons here are only a penny. Let's stock up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋，这里的卫生棉条只要一美分，我们买来屯积。

yingyinNormal.en: Fresh vegetable stock. This is a good cheat, or you can use you know the cubed vegetable stock. You can get these in the supermarket, just pour that on top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新鲜蔬菜汤料。偷懒的好方法，你也可以用块状的，能在超市买到，浇在上面。

yingyinNormal.en: Lucca's right. The debt strike is working. Colosseum stock is falling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卢卡说得对，债务罢工生效了，克鲁斯曼的股价正在下跌。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 股票; 债券; 股份; 资本
库存; 储备; 常备的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 库存；存货；资本；股本；原汤；高汤；祖先；世系；家系；种类；种群；树干；主干；紫罗兰属植物；手足枷；枪托；白色领结；白色领带；船台

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 股市；证券交易所；证券市场

sense_info_list.en: the capital raised by a business or corporation through the issue and subscription of shares
sense_info_list.zh: 股票; 债券; 股份; 资本

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>stock</highlight> market reacts positively when companies tie CEO pay to, say, <highlight>stock</highlight> prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比如，当公司将首席执行官的薪酬与股价挂钩时，股市反应积极。

examination_example.sentence: The average time for holding a <highlight>stock</highlight> in both the United States and Britain has dropped from seven years to seven months in recent decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近几十年来，美国和英国的平均持股时间都从7年下降到7个月。

examination_example.sentence: Much more could be done to encourage "long-termism," such as changes in the tax code and quicker disclosure of <highlight>stock</highlight> acquisitions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可以采取更多措施鼓励"长期主义"，例如修改税法和使股票收购更便捷、更透明。

examination_example.sentence: Soon you'll feel comfortable asking if they've any knuckles of ham for soups and stews, or beef bones, chicken carcasses and fish heads for <highlight>stock</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久，你会感到舒适自在，询问他们是否有可以炖汤或者炖菜的火腿，或者是用来熬高汤的牛骨、 鸡架和鱼头时。

examination_example.sentence: Mine is filled with leftovers, bread, <highlight>stock</highlight>, meat and fish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的则装满了剩菜、面包、高汤、肉和鱼。

sense_info_list.zh: 库存; 储备; 常备的

sense_info_list.en: usual or typical, and used or done so many times that it is no longer original

word_usage.usage: stock既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后常接名词或代词，如：stock grain；作不及物动词时，其后接介词，如：stock up/on/with sth.，表示“贮备某物”。
stock作形容词时，只用于名词前，修饰该名词，如：stock sizes 常备尺码。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 长（统）袜；长统袜；袜状弹性绷带；白斑

word_family.mean: n. 库存；存货；资本；股本；原汤；高汤；祖先；世系；家系；种类；种群；树干；主干；紫罗兰属植物；手足枷；枪托；白色领结；白色领带；船台

sense_info_list.en:
the total amount of goods or the amount of a particular type of goods available in a shop; 
keep a supply of a particular type of things, such as goods, books, food, or others

examination_example.sentence: The practice of destroying unsold <highlight>stock</highlight>, and even rolls of unused fabric, is commonplace for luxury labels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 销毁未售出的存货，甚至是一卷卷未使用的布料，这种做法对奢侈品品牌来说是司空见惯的。

examination_example.sentence: Last week, Burberry's annual report revealed that £28.6 million worth of <highlight>stock</highlight> was burnt last year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，Burberry的年度报告显示，去年有价值2860万英镑的库存被烧毁。

examination_example.sentence: No one in fashion is surprised that Burberry burnt £28 million of <highlight>stock</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时尚界没有人对巴宝莉烧掉2800万英镑的库存感到惊讶。

sense_info_list.en: the capital raised by a business or corporation through the issue and subscription of shares
sense_info_list.zh: 股票; 股份; 资本

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Stock</highlight> prices rose or sank according to his pronouncements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 股票价格根据他的声明上涨或下跌。

sense_info_list.en: the family or group that a person or animal comes from
sense_info_list.zh: 祖先; 家族; 种群

examination_example.sentence: Leaders would call a temporary stop to fishing for key species in order to give fish <highlight>stocks</highlight> an opportunity to replenish (补充).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 领导者将呼吁暂时停止捕捞关键物种，以便为鱼类种群提供补充的机会。

sense_info_list.en: animals, such as cows or sheep, kept on a farm

examination_example.sentence: Most of <highlight>stock</highlight> clerks try to get Friday night off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数存货职员都会在周五晚上休息。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about the speaker as a <highlight>stock</highlight> clerk?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们从这名存货职员身上能得知什么？

examination_example.sentence: When we married, I worked as a <highlight>stock</highlight> clerk at Southwest Super Foods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们结婚的时候，我在西南超级食品公司做仓库管理员。

sense_info_list.en:
the total amount of goods or the amount of a particular type of goods available in a shop; 
keep a supply of a particular type of things; such as goods; books; food; or others

examination_example.sentence: U. S. bike shops weren't interested in <highlight>stocking</highlight> ebikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国自行车商店对采购电动自行车不感兴趣。

sense_info_list.en: usual or typical; and used or done so many times that it is no longer original

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: His first job was as a <highlight>stock</highlight> boy at the Battle Creek Sanitarium.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的第一份工作是在巴特克里疗养院做货品管理员。

examination_example.sentence: Will worked as a <highlight>stock</highlight> boy before he became a manager of the sanitarium.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尔在成为疗养院经理之前，曾做过货品管理员。

examination_example.sentence: During the next three months Millet painted with all his might, enlarged his <highlight>stock</highlight> all he could!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的三个月里，米勒竭尽全力地作画，尽可能地增加自己的画作存量！

examination_example.sentence: Alibaba went public on the New York <highlight>Stock</highlight> Exchange（纽约证券交易所）, raising $25 billion through an IPO(公司股票的首次公开发行), the biggest in the US history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿里巴巴在纽约证券交易所上市，通过公司股票的首次公开发行筹集了250亿美元，这是美国历史上规模最大的一次。
